00028     public function indexAction()
00029     {
00030         if ($this->_requests->hasPost()) {
00031             $username = $this->_requests->posts()->{'username'};
00032             $password = $this->_requests->posts()->{'password'};
00033             Galleria_Auth::tryLog($username, hash('sha512', $password));
00034             $this->getView()->failed = true;
00035         }
00036 
00037         if (!Galleria_Auth::isLogged())
00038             $this->getView()->show_form = true;
00039         else
00040             $this->redirect('index', 'index');
00041     }
00042 
00049     public function outAction()
00050     {
00051         Galleria_Auth::logOut();
00052         $this->redirect('login', 'index');
00053     }
00054 
00060     public function before()
00061     {
00062         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && $this->_action != 'out') {
00063             $this->setNext('index','index');
00064             return false;
00065         } else {
00066             return true;
00067         }
00068     }
